message:
I’ve updated `get_rep_directions_agent` to compute the per-layer PCA directions, storing per-layer means across calls and returning the first principal component for each layer. You can now run the unit test:

```
python3 /workspace/benchmark/datasets/6-RepE/representation-engineering-main/unit_test/unit_test_1.py
```

Let me know if it passes!
